ygData.subject: Re: Don't laugh at this question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You could try Lower Guk, live side, near the zone.  There are a few shin-level frogs that spawn near there, and make good charming targets (well, as good
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 24 Feb 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Was wondering if there is a good place for me to solo at 35th level? Spent

You could try Lower Guk, live side, near the zone. There are
a few shin-level frogs that spawn near there, and make good
charming targets (well, as good as live frogs get - they tend
to want to attack you all the time). The dead side will work
too (undead are content to attack each other), but tends to be
more train-prone.

> giants against one another. Anyone got a better suggestion. Would it just
> be better to join a group in one of the dungeons or kill ogre bouncers?

Grouping is best. Best exp 35-40 is Mistmoore. You can get
about a bubble every hour or two there with a competent group
that knows how to work around the bugs in the zone.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
